description: During a bank robbery, two tellers behind the counter, one holding money bags, are confronted by an individual holding a handgun. The robber is wearing a long coat and an unusual, tall, conical head covering. Despite the immediate danger of the armed holdup, the tellers are ironically preoccupied with observing a visible flaw in the robber's legwear, specifically a run in their nylon. This absurd focus on a minor fashion detail during a life-threatening situation underscores the dark humor and surreal detachment depicted.
caption: "God, Harriet ... check out the run in his nylon."
